title: Healthy
body: Will never use a chip pan again. Food cooked perfectly. The best thing I cooked in it was a whole chicken. Cooked to perfection I sprayed some olive oil on it & sprinkled with spices…delicious.

title: That it’s easy to use.
body: Love this air fryer, so easy to use, easy to clean

title: Brilliant Machine - Huge drawer, easy to use controls
body: What can I say about this Air Fryer?? Well I've probably not used half of it's features yet! But it's a great machine. Really easy to clean. Has a huge drawer that can fit in multiple items. Cooks from the top and bottom, so no opening it up and turning stuff around. It's brilliant!

title: Does exactly what it says on the box?
body: This is my go to means of cooking now,being on my own my main oven is virtually redundant?

title: Good size for 4 portions
body: Handy to have the recipe book as guidance to get started. Quick and easy to use.

title: A very useful addition to the kitchen
body: I thought long and hard about investing in an air fryer and did a fair amount of research. Based on Which, and family recommendations, I decided to purchase this Cosori air fryer.I have always been a keen cook regularly preparing new dishes and entertaining family and friends. Since the increased cost of electricity it seemed to be the right moment to go ahead and so far I have been very pleased with it. The instructions and recipes are very clear and simplified using it for the first time, but now I am having fun adapting my own recipes I have hardly used my oven for roasting since purchasing the air fryerand feel confident that it will inevitably save us money in the long term. The only reason I havent awarded 5 stars is because I would rather like to have had a griddle incorporated, but other than that, I am well satisfied with the ease of cooking. In addition the lack of many dishes to wash afterwards and the simplicity of cleaning the air fryer components after preparing a meal is a bonus.

title: Fan Failed
body: Good for 9 months, then fan motor failed. Now at recyling centre!

title: Great product & customer service
body: Love this product, so quick & easy to use. Cosori customer service have been great too when I required a replacement part after accidental damage. Would definitely purchase more items from them.

title: An excellent customer service
body: I usually do not leave a comment before using the thing for a while and this one is another long-term usage review. My wife loves it so much that she was extremely upset when we encountered an issue. I was amazed by the prompt resolution of our issue by Cosori's customer service. Having support for a product is crucial. Again, thank you very much.

title: Delivery
body: Haven’t used my oven since getting this and have cooked lots of different things

title: Great airfryer
body: Have had two airfryers before but this is the best. Had this for quite a while now, does a great job of everything the manufacturer claims it can do.

title: THE best gadget you didn’t know you needed!
body: Wow! I’d seen all the hype about airfryers but was worried that it would become a white elephant in the kitchen once the novelty had worn off…how wrong!Since this arrived into my life I have switched my oven on once! Everything I have wanted to cook is quick and easy in the airfryer and smells are mostly contained too! Sausages under the grill with all the smell/smoke/and fat flare ups are a thing of the past. Quick and easy in the airfryer and no mess…hallelujah!! Bacon cooked to perfection 👌Thank you Cosori for revolutionising my cooking and halving my electricity bill 👏👏

title: ok
body: first air fryer and it is a bit too small but would struggle with a heavier one, as I have issues with both wrists. love using the pre heat to reheat burgers etc....so far so good -- takes more space than I thought as it has to be away from the wall --

title: Very pleased with this
body: I've had this around a month now and I'm overall very pleased. I have yet to use all the various functions/presets, but it all seems to work as intended. I think the most remarkable part for me is just how easy it is to clean the basket, it really is a dream.

title: Game changer
body: Read lots of reviews before opting for this air fryer. The dual heating elements make all the difference and Cosori customer support is excellent. would definitely recommend.
